    ActionList Gate.allowableActions​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction)
    checks to see if the actor has a key with the unlock ability if so it returns a UnlockGate action if the gate is Unlocked then it returns the MovePlayerAction.

    Tick method of this class calls the spawn method with the location in the parameter
    void Void.tick​(Location location)
    checks each turn if the actor standing on it can walk on voids if not it sets them to unconscious
